demo.cardsCaption: Each preview pairs an Italian verb with the scenario you will actually face.

cards.tip: Focus on the -are endings: parlo, parli, parla. We color-code endings so you spot the pattern fast.
Notice the irregular io vado / noi andiamo pair. The deck surfaces this every few sessions.
Pair volere with conditional phrases (vorrei un biglietto). Shadow native audio to nail intonation.
We contrast sapere vs. conoscere so you stop second-guessing yourself mid-sentence.

highlights: Confidence tracking nudges tougher cards sooner.
Context sentences keep vocabulary grounded in real life.
Micro reflections after each card reinforce the why.
